problems.title: Count Even Numbers in Each Window
problems.description:
Given an array of integers and a window size k, print the number of even numbers in every contiguous subarray (window) of size k. If k is greater than n, print nothing.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and k.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print the count of even numbers for each window of size k on a single line, separated by spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 3
1 2 4 5 6

Sample Output
2 2 2

Explanation:
Windows: [1,2,4] -> 2 evens, [2,4,5] -> 2 evens, [4,5,6] -> 2 evens. (Your implementation should match the definition of even numbers in the window.)
hintsList: Maintain the count of even numbers in the current window instead of recounting each time.
When you slide the window, update the count by checking the element leaving and the element entering the window.
